posts.cooked:
Hi everyone! The Signal team is releasing a new version of Signal Desktop, v7.64.0-beta.1. If youre interested in participating, join the beta here.

Release notes:

  • We improved the message read/unread experience while multitasking, and fixed a bug that sometimes incorrectly opened the expanded image viewer if you hit the space bar while searching for the perfect emoji reaction. You can still zoom if you click on the image, or if you type quickly enough.

Commit changes: Comparing v7.63.0-beta.1v7.64.0-beta.1 路 signalapp/Signal-Desktop 路 GitHub

Beta feedback for the upcoming Desktop 7.63 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.64.0-beta.1

37 new commits since 7.63.0-beta.1:

Show commits

  • v7.64.0-alpha.1 [1]

  • Donations: Finish wiring up the 3ds validation flow [2]

  • Message.tsx: Show expiring metadata when rendering generic attachments [3]

  • Add integration test for call decline [4]

  • Introduce new DonationVerificationModal to kick off 3ds verification [5]

  • Use non-global flag for usePqRatchet [6]

  • Update to signalapp/windows-ucv v1.0.1 [7]

  • Update libsignal-client to v0.76.4 [8]

  • Introduce new donation progress modals [9]

  • Introduce new DonationErrorModal component [10]

  • Only queue backfilled attachments after backfill response [11]

  • Initial donation amount picker [12]

  • Use react-dom/client createRoot [13]

  • Allow passing newest read message explicitly [14]

  • Increase max displayable image dimensions [15]

  • Avoid race condition when marking messages read [16]

  • Donations: Show toasts when resuming after startup [17]

  • release notes [18]

  • Update strings [19]

  • Update DNS fallback [20]

  • Stop round-tripping wallpaper data [21]

  • Refactor backup media download progress tracking [22]

  • Fixes and improvements to Donations Home Page [23]

  • Init card form validation [24]

  • Fix space key opening lightbox on image reactions [25]

  • Inline long-text messages in the backup proto [26]

  • Style donation amount picker [27]

  • sendSyncMessageOnly: Keep timer if it exists [28]

  • Mark messages read on delay when timeline becomes visible [29]

  • Privacy.ts: Additional safety for debug logs [30]

  • Donations: Show progress, error and verify dialogs [31]

  • Privacy: Additional tweaks to debug log generation [32]

  • Upgrade libsignal to 0.76.6 [33]

  • Upgrade libsignal to 0.76.7 [34]

  • Release notes for 7.64 [35]

  • Update strings [36]

  • 7.64.0-beta.1 [37]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Desktop v7.63.0-beta.1v7.64.0-beta.1

posts.name: Xashyar
posts.cooked:
Suddenly received submit a debug log prompt:

https://debuglogs.org/desktop/7.64.0-beta.1/87173d8184d94f32ee31d1a86f775790b3eb732724d6ed0b43d878245a3c1772.gz

Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming Desktop 7.65 release.
